item.title: Covid-19 Tracker
item.description: Built Covid-19 Tracker Web app that fetches data from Worldometer’s API, which updates every 10 minutes Demo

item.title: Welcome to Quiz Bowl Team
item.description: What is Quiz Bowl? Quiz Bowl is an academic competition in which two teams compete to answer questions from all areas of knowledge, including history, literature, science, fine arts, current events, pop culture, sports, and more. This video is from the NAQT, which is an organization that provides Quiz Bowl questions. How does Quiz Bowl work? Quiz Bowl is unique in the sense that it is an academic competition in which you don’t take a test for, but, instead, you buzz in to answer questions, which makes tournaments an enjoyable experience.

item.title: How to Import Quizlet Decks to Anki
item.description: Importing decks from Quizlet into Anki is very simple. Here’s how: Steps to Import With Anki open, navigate to the toolbar Go to Tools > Add-ons Click Get Add-ons Paste 538351043 and hit OK (This installs the Quizlet Importer add-on) Next, Restart Anki Go to the Quizlet deck you want to import Copy the link, then go to Tools > Import from Quizlet Paste the Quizlet link, hit OK, and you’re all done.

item.title: CommonPlace v2
item.description: Note: This app is in progress An app to connect communities of any sort such as clubs, hobby groups, or classes by creating a “Common Place”. Users can create a community in which posts can be made, and users can schedule events which can be attended by others in their “Common Place” Flutter SDK used to build the app with data from Cloud Firestore backend. Features include direct messaging, group messaging, video call, and posts with file attachments.

item.title: Internshift
item.description: App to aggregate internships and job openings for high school and college age students designed to decrease difficulty in the application process. Internships and jobs at an early age have been shown to increase a student’s success in their designated field. Built using Flutter SDK with Firebase Authentication for the authentication and Cloud Firestore for the Backend. Submitted to Congressional App Challenge under District TX-30 represented by Congresswoman Eddie Bernice Johnson and placed 2nd.

item.title: The Levels of Vehicle Automation in 3 Minutes
item.description: With automation and especially automation in cars becoming more present in everyday life, it is important to know the concepts associated with the new technology that will one day be all around us. Here are the levels of vehicle automation in 3 minutes. Level 0: No Automation These vehicles are the normal everyday cars that are manually controlled and ones that you most likely own. Almost all cars available fall in this category.

item.title: How to Remove Password Protection from a PDF on a Mac
item.description: Steps Open the PDF in Preview by double-clicking it in Finder Go to File > Export as PDF... Remove the second .pdf and save the file There will be a dialog that asks to replace it, click Replace That’s it. The password protection has been removed from the PDF.

item.title: How to Get Started with Hugo
item.description: This tutorial will explain the steps needed to get started with Hugo to build a static website for your blog or portfolio. What is Hugo? Hugo is a free and open source static site generator used by many to create blogs or portfolio websites for themselves. I myself use Hugo for this portfolio/blog site. Step 1: Installation The easiest way to install Hugo is through Homebrew. I recommend installing Homebrew as it makes downloading apps a lot easier.

item.title: BuzzerBowl
item.description: Note: This app is in progress An app for Quiz Bowl players to practice quiz bowl questions Functionality includes ability to create or join games, practice, live buzzing, and native text-to-speech functionality for iOS, Android, MacOS, and Web. Front end made using the Flutter SDK and backend made using Cloud Firestore

item.title: My Favorite Free and Professional Video-Editing Program
item.description: Note: This article was updated with the release of DaVinci Resolve 17 DaVinci Resolve 17 is a video editing software that is FREE, used by professionals and packs many features that make it a great alternative to Adobe’s Creative Cloud or Apple’s Final Cut. What is DaVinci Resolve? If you take a look at the main video-editing softwares used by professionals, you’re most likely going to see either Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro X.

item.title: Shop Your Store (SYS)
item.description: Note: This app is in progress An Android and iOS e-commerce app that gives every user their own “store”, so they can sell their items and other users can “shop their store”. This project is geared at people who want to sell off old clothes and those who don’t have the means to run their own website due to cost. This app was built with the Flutter SDK as the front end and Cloud Firestore as the backend.

item.title: CommonPlace
item.description: An app to connect the community in a neighborhood together. Features include direct messaging, user search, chat rooms, and secure sign in and sign up through Firebase Authentication Built using the Flutter SDK as a frontend and Cloud Firestore as a backend for chatrooms and user data storage

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: This portfolio page was made using Hugo, a static site generator. I made this portfolio to showcase my resume, my projects, and some of my thoughts in a blog format. If you would like to know how to get started with Hugo, click here .

item.title: Porsche Taycan Edit Video
item.description: This was a challenge to edit a video using Youtuber Justin Tse’s footage.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Akhil Peddikuppa and I am currently a sophomore at the School for the Talented and Gifted in Dallas, Texas. I’m now 15 years old and intending to study medicine in the future. My main areas of interest are biology, chemistry, technology, and business, and I have been self learning about these topics for use in my everyday life. Recently, I’ve been researching peer to peer networking and decentralized network protocols with technology like IPFS or the InterPlanetary File System.
